title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Blended Education Program Based on Anatomy and Physiology Laboratory Manuals

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the anatomical structures and physiological functions of major human organ systems with 85% accuracy.
Learners can independently perform the five standard experimental protocols presented in the laboratory manual.
Learners can submit experimental result analysis reports within 72 hours through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
